codicil-to-will.title: Codicil To Will
codicil-to-will.description: Update your will efficiently without starting over. Adapt your estate plan as life circumstances change.

durable-power-of-attorney.title: Durable Power Of Attorney
durable-power-of-attorney.description: Protect your financial future by appointing a trusted agent. Ensure bills are paid and assets are managed if you're unable.

joint-living-trust.title: Joint Living Trust
joint-living-trust.description: Protect your family's wealth and avoid expensive probate. Transfer assets quickly to loved ones without court delays.

last-will-testament.title: Last Will Testament
last-will-testament.description: Secure your family's future by controlling how your assets are distributed. Prevent family conflicts and legal complications.

living-trust.title: Living Trust
living-trust.description: Protect your family's privacy and wealth from expensive probate. Transfer assets quickly while maintaining confidentiality.

living-trust-amendment.title: Living Trust Amendment
living-trust-amendment.description: Keep your estate plan current as life evolves. Adapt your trust to reflect new relationships and changed circumstances.

pour-over-will.title: Pour Over Will
pour-over-will.description: Ensure complete asset protection by capturing overlooked property. Guarantee nothing is missed in your estate plan.

power-of-attorney.title: Power Of Attorney
power-of-attorney.description: Maintain control over your affairs even when unavailable. Ensure trusted agents can act on your behalf in emergencies.

revocation-of-power-of-attorney.title: Revocation Of Power Of Attorney
revocation-of-power-of-attorney.description: Regain control by revoking outdated authorizations. Protect yourself when relationships or circumstances change.

simple-will.title: Simple Will
simple-will.description: Protect your loved ones with straightforward estate planning. Ensure your wishes are honored without complex arrangements.
